game_description: Play Together. Maybe Forever. Grab a friend and work to help Carly on her quest to escape the Underworld in this award-winning puzzle-platforming adventure designed for cooperative online play in VR. Your friend can join as Carly for free on PC or Mac! Step into the recently-dead shoes of Carly as you run and jump your way through incredible platforming challenges -- or take up the mantle of the Reaperman and change the environment around you in real-time to give Carly new places to explore, avoid dangerous obstacles, and help her to achieve the impossible. Carly and the Reaperman is a unique VR co-op experience that balances brains and brawn as together, you puzzle your way through the insidious platforms of the Underworld.
Languages: English, Chinese (China), French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish (Spain), Swedish
review_1: Devs!! Please give the option to turn down and/or off the music. I can barely hear the other player’s voice over the game music & sound effects. It’s really annoying!! Otherwise super fun!
review_2: Carly and the Reaperman is a game like Moss, Mixture and Ven. Its a platformer where you control a character (Carly) like a classic platformer, but also interact with her in a God like former (Reaperman). The game has amazing camera controls and supports room scaling. You will never have a bad camera angle in this game, and you can explore and move around the worlds freely. The game is a lot of fun and reminds me of Mario, but you solve puzzles and help the character in a God like way get through the platforming levels. The controls are easy to master and you will be controlling Carly and interacting with the world like a pro. The game has over 50 levels of platforming fun to complete and a story to following along. If you enjoyed games like Moss, you have to try this gem out.
